weapons.name: Wyndian Quill Bow
weapons.description: A finely crafted shortbow made with Wyndian feathers that hums with wind magic. Arrows fired from it crackle with lightning.

weapons.name: Crystal Shard Blade
weapons.description: A dagger made from a shard of the pulsating Crystal Spire. Once per day, its wielder can cause it to flare with power, dealing extra harm.

weapons.name: Void-Kissed Blade
weapons.description: A dark, obsidian runeblade imbued with Void energy. On a critical hit, the target is afflicted with a debilitating, supernatural chill.

weapons.name: Stormvine Whip
weapons.description: A living whip braided from storm-infused vines. On a critical hit, the vines instinctively lash out, attempting to grapple the target.

weapons.name: Grasping Ivy
weapons.description: A legendary whip grown from a cutting of the purified Gloomwood Heart. It can be used to command nearby plants to ensnare a foe.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Skin Vest
armor_and_shields.description: A leather tunic reinforced with plates of rock from Scalebound territory. It fills the wearer with the resilience of the mountain, making them feel stronger.

armor_and_shields.name: Stone-Forged Aegis
armor_and_shields.description: A shield of pure mountain stone, imbued with a ward of divine light. It provides exceptional protection against hostile magic.

foci.name: Channeler's Ring
foci.description: A simple copper ring that hums with a faint energy. When you wear this ring, you can unleash a minor bolt of pure magical force (1-harm, magical).

foci.name: Ring of Embers
foci.description: A ring of blackened steel that is always warm to the touch. When you wear this ring, you can unleash a bolt of searing fire (1-harm, magical, fire).

foci.name: Oracle's Gyre
foci.description: A spiraling ring of petrified wood and silver. Once per day, you can use it to mark a target with a terrible omen, causing them to falter and fail at their next significant action.

accessories.name: Tattered Map of the Azure Steppes
accessories.description: An old, worn map of the plains.
accessories.move: When you consult this map while Surveying the Azure Steppes, you can ask one additional question, even on a miss.
